thread.title: Younis Khan Breaks Javed Miandad Test Record
thread.title_full: Younis Khan Breaks Javed Miandad Test Record

author: Dua
title: Younis Khan Breaks Javed Miandad Test Record
text:
Cricket Â· 
Karachi, Younis Khan is the leading test player of Pakistan and he broke the record of Javed Miandad to score highest total in test cricket. Before this, Javed Miandad scored total 8832 runs in the test cricket, which was the highest total of any Pakistani batsman in the test cricket. Inzamam Ul Haq followed him with the second highest total in the test cricket. He scored 8829 runs but he was stumped out in his last innings and he failed to break the record with 3 runs. http://www.dailymotion.com/videox39ihup 
Younis Khan is playing the first test match against England in which he scored 38 runs but before the start of the match, he needed only 19 runs to set up new world record for Pakistan. He hit a towering six and broke the record of Inzamam and Javed Miandad with one big shot and he moved from the third position to the first position with this shot. He already made the record of most test centuries from Pakistan side, as he scored 30 test centuries and leading the Pakistani side. He has good batting average of 53.97 and he also participated in 61 test centuries partnerships in the test cricket. Younis Khan Pictures
